text.more:
The Design Integration Methodsâ€™ Network is an interactive network that visualizes the functions and the responsibilities of the identified C-Levels.
Every C-Level is represented by a pole, through a network of interconnections which connects the business units of the organization, with a specific focus on the Chief Design Officer.
The size of each C-Level pole is directly proportional to the number of connected functions, whose size is determined by the number of C-Levels responsible for that function.
text.intro: This tool shows the integration of the design function and the responsabilities of the Chief Design Officer amongst other business units within the organization.
text.title: Design Integration Methods' Network
